text:
[Verse]
We were young and bold
Dreams like fireworks
In a sky so wide
We'd find our way

[Verse 2]
Through the dark we'd run
Chasing the night lights
Hands interwoven
Hearts like starlight

[Chorus]
Lost in the stars
Floating so high
You and me forever
In the midnight sky

[Verse 3]
Whispered secrets shared
Underneath the moon
Promises we made
Would never fade

[Bridge]
Now we drift apart
Like fading embers
Wish upon a star
To remember

[Chorus]
Lost in the stars
Floating so high
You and me forever
In the midnight sky
title: Lost in the Stars
